title: Sergei Skripal discharged from UK hospital
text:
Sergei Skripal discharged from UK hospital Friday, May 18, 2018 - 01:06
The former Russian spy who was poisoned by a nerve agent in Britain more than two months ago, has been discharged from hospital, England's health service said on Friday (May 18). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The former Russian spy who was poisoned by a nerve agent in Britain more than two months ago, has been discharged from hospital, England's health service said on Friday (May 18).
